name: Teacup (itch)
description:
Play in fullscreen for a better experience! If the game becomes stuck downloading an update, refresh the page and quickly click to play.
Help Teacup find herbs for her upcoming tea party! A chill slice-of-life adventure game currently in development. Any feedback is appreciated!
Controls: Arrow keys, space bar and mouse.
A game by Smarto Club. Art by @sukinapan and @dos_banderass. Programming by @alce_x. Music by @bantablackoficial.
